titleStmt.title: Delectable demaundes, and pleasaunt questions, with their seuerall aunswers, in matters of loue, naturall causes, with morall and politique deuises. Newely translated out of Frenche into Englishe, this present yere of our Lorde God. 1566
titleStmt.author: Landi, Ortensio, ca. 1512-ca. 1553. Quattro libri di dubbi.
Chartier, Alain, 15th cent, attributed name.
Painter, William, 1540?-1594.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules Churchyarde by Iohn Cawood for Nicholas Englande,

notesStmt.note: Based on the 1st 3 bks. of Ortensio Landi's "Quattro libri di dubbi", Vinegia, 1556, probably through the French translation "Questions diverses", Lyon, 1558--STC.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
